content: This shocking news is now on mainstream media after Binance lost Billion dollar revenue due to there customer leaving because of mandatory KYC requirements to all accounts. This force none KYC to leave after they decrease the minimum withdrawal limit to 0.06BTC which is very low to there previous limit. I guess CZ canâ€™t do anything to fight against regulators. I guess other big CEX will follow in the near future.Source Report: https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/22/08/28282117/binance-says-it-lost-90-of-customers-and-billions-in-revenue-after-implementing-kycEDITCZ denied already this news on his twitter post. https://twitter.com/cz_binance/status/1554056739246559232
